item.title: Overflowing commercial bins left on residential road, 27th June
item.description:
I'm not sure which commercial premises regularly leaves these overflowing and ugly bins on this residential road, but these photos were taken after 5pm.on a Friday so they were not awaiting collection. They are overflowing, unhygienic and should not be on this road at all. There is excess rubbish strewn around, encouraging further flytipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westfield Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped obstructing recycling bins, 27th June
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Andrews Mews, Hackney, London

item.title: Durrington Road is filthy, 27th June
item.description:
Every weekend starting after trash and recycling pick up, there is littering and remnants of trash and recycling not picked up by the council. The road looks disgusting on the weekends due to this. Please can something be done. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Durrington Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
